Class ServerSceneController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ServerSceneController

  • public class ServerSceneController
extends java.lang.Object
    ServerSceneController objects is responsible for the GUI; looks specified in the fxml file. Initializes the ServerUnit object and is responsible for all the links between Observable Lists and GUI elements. This object is created by hareBox

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Sets up main GUI components - user's list and files' list. Creates a ServerUnit object.
        See Also:
        ServerUnit

      • updateClientsWithUsersList

        public void updateClientsWithUsersList()
        Gets the current users' list and sends it out to all online clients.
        See Also:
        PacketObject

      • findUserInList

        public int findUserInList(RegisteredUser changedUser)
        Looks for the index of the specific user in the server's list, looking by their username.
        Parameters:
        changedUser - User to find in the list
        Returns:
        Index of the user or -1, if they're not known to the server.

      • linkUserListToMap

        public void linkUserListToMap()
        Adds a listener to the observable map of users, so it's possible to display on JFXListView, if the user is online or offline. Sets the cell factory for JFXListView, so it displays only the name and the appropriate status icon. Also, enables to add/remove a customized tab. It's impossible to add a tab to a new user, because they're not yet in the TreeList.

      • linkFileTreeToList

        public void linkFileTreeToList()
        Adds a listener to the observable list of files, so it's possible to display on JFXTreeView without duplicates. Sets the cell factory for JFXTreeView, so it displays only the filename and the appropriate extension icon.
